subject: Football
Deaths (Obituaries)
Nineteen Hundred Forties
lead_paragraph: Mr. McAfee carried the football, passed it, kicked and punted it, and roamed the defensive backfield for the mighty Chicago Bears teams of the 1940s.
snippet: Mr. McAfee carried the football, passed it, kicked and punted it, and roamed the defensive backfield for the mighty Chicago Bears teams of the 1940s.
